Flow.description: Trigger Flow to copy Addresses on Account Creation - For Created B2C Accounts: Billing to Shipping - For Converted B2C Accounts: Mailing to Billing and Billing to Shipping OR Other to Shipping - For B2B Accounts: Billing to Shipping (Mailing and Other remain Blank) 24.3.2023 removed temporarily address parts /JJ 24.04.2023 Merged with Other Account Before Save Flow - HR 24.04.2023 Reconnect Elements 24.4.2023 Restructuring & added elements from after save flow to update profit center & office 4.7.2023 add MC opt Finland Spain and Other Countries 10.7.2023 Updated Record.county__c to Record.BillingCountry in Check Country decision 10.7.2023 Updated Other_Countries_Sync_to_MC__c to FALSE in the 'do not sync' outcome 31.10.2023 Updated the Clearing of MC Flags 31.10.2023 removed updated the person account MC Fields 31.10.2023 updated the account MC Fields country check 18.12.2023 updated clearing MC sync 04.01.2023 Fixed Country Assignment (needs country code not country) 25.01.2024 Added Cost Center 30.01.2024 Update Logic to update Sales Area and Office 30.01.2024 Added Postal Code Area Lookup 16.02.2024 Set Default Language 22.03.2024 Fixed Business Attribute assignment for postal Code Area
